info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 7:18PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MONROE... SOUTHEASTERN BELMONT AND MARSHALL COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodsfield, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moundsville, Bellaire, Shadyside, McMechen, Powhatan Point, Glen Dale, Benwood, Beallsville, Clarington, Neffs, Jerusalem, and Wilson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
